item.title: Iran protests: 2,500 killed, activists say, as judiciary promises swift trials
item.description: More than 2,500 people have died during nationwide protests in Iran over the past 17 days, activists said Wednesday.

item.title: US talks pose 'conundrum' for Greenland, Denmark: Analysts
item.description: U.S. officials are expected to meet with Danish and Greenlandic counterparts in Washington, D.C. on Wednesday.

item.title: Luxury retailer Saks Global files for bankruptcy as it prepares to restructure
item.description: Luxury retailer Saks Global has filed for bankruptcy, preparing to reposition itself after obtaining about $1.75 billion in financing commitments

item.title: WATCH: Puppy training for avalanche rescues rides the slopes on ski patroller's shoulders
item.description: David Muir shares the adorable moment caught on tape of a 5-month-old puppy, who's training to become a certified avalanche rescue dog, skiing down th...

item.title: WATCH: Paraglider survives nearly 500-foot fall into ocean
item.description: A paraglider survived a nearly 500-foot fall into the ocean off the coast of Florida, authorities say.
